wikipedia_converter module#

class wikipedia_converter.WikipediaArticle(title_input: str | None = None)[source]#

Bases: object

A class to manage a wikipedia article and its convertion to LaTeX

accents = {'à': '#A1#', 'á': '#A4#', 'â': '#A2#', 'ä': '#A3#', 'ç': '#C1#', 'è': '#E2#', 'é': '#E1#', 'ê': '#E3#', 'ë': '#E4#', 'í': '#I3#', 'î': '#I2#', 'ï': '#I1#', 'ñ': '#N1#', 'ó': '#O3#', 'ô': '#O1#', 'ö': '#O2#', 'ù': '#U1#', 'ú': '#U4#', 'û': '#U2#', 'ü': '#U3#', 'ÿ': '#Y1#'}#
